Name: Het IJspaleis
Review Text: Definitely one of Amsterdamâ€™s better ice cream vendors. I had one scoop of Stroopwafel and one scoop of Unicorn both were fantastic and I highly recommend. Would have given 5 stars if the lemon cheesecake were slightly less lemon-sorbet ish.

Name: Het IJspaleis
Review Text:
The woman who attended us was totally unfriendly.
My daughter was asking for an empty cone, and I was willing to pay the same price, but apparently it was not possible... â€¦

Name: Het IJspaleis
Review Text: This place has been around for 12 years and I never visited it as a ice cream lover. Until today! Very friendly owner/staff. Good selection of ice cream. Ice cream is self made. Place looks clean. â€¦

Name: Het IJspaleis
Review Text: Some people just have no idea about customer service. When the choices of ice cream places is growing, there is no way I can recommend this place. Having ordered for my friend, I asked if I could just try the mango flavour. I love mango ice â€¦

Name: Het IJspaleis
Review Text: A lovely little ice cream place nearby the Albert Cuyp Market. I'm a big fan of fruit flavours and it was my first time trying Maracuja! Had it with Mango - so delicious!

Name: Het IJspaleis
Review Text: We ADORE the ice cream, coffee and service we receive at Het ijspaleis. Audrey and Rene the owners are wonderfully friendly people who take great pride in their ice cream and the service they offer customers.  The cafe is spotlessly clean â€¦

Name: Het IJspaleis
Review Text: Not special in any way. Flavourwise, servisewise.

Name: Het IJspaleis
Review Text: They charged my card for four random purchases when I only made one. I've now had to open a fraud case with my bank and cancel all my cards! Scammers! Avoid!

Name: Het IJspaleis
Review Text: Mice are crawling all over the place. Disgusting!

Name: Het IJspaleis
Review Text: Yum

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Super location to enjoy a nice ice cream in the summer. But now get Hot pot in the store and also super tasty empadas. â€¦

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Super nice there, they have delicious flavors of ice cream, you can sit on a terrace in the sun, directly at the Albert Cuyp Market and the Sarphatipark. Very friendly staff. â€¦
